talk.author: did:plc:fpruhuo22xkm5o7ttr2ktxdo
talk.utter: the motivation is that with the “oldest first” as a default, there is very little incentive to add to the conversation if you missed the moment a post was added. people with big followers would get seen (by their followers) but people with smaller accounts don’t get a real chance at getting seen
